The '''2025–26 Merrimack Warriors Men's ice hockey season''' will be the 70th season of play for the program, the 37th at the Division I level, and the 37th in Hockey East. The Warriors will represent Merrimack College in the 2025–26 NCAA Division I men's ice hockey season, play their home games at the J. Thom Lawler Rink and be coached by Scott Borek, in his 8th season.
